com.pos.device.picc

Class MifareUltralight

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.picc.MifareUltralight

  • public class MifareUltralight
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the operating about mifare ultralight card.

    Created by NP-JAY on 2016/9/23.

      • readPage

        public byte[] readPage(int pageOffset)
        To read four pages data from mifare ultralight.
        Parameters:
        pageOffset - the page no to be read out, 0~15.
        Returns:
        returns the four page data from mifare ultralight card, 16bytes total

      • writePage

        public void writePage(int pageOffset,
             byte[] data)
        To write one page data into mifare ultralight card.
        Parameters:
        pageOffset - the page no to be wrote, 0~15.
        data - the page data to be wrote, 4bytes.

      • writeFourPages

                  byte[] data)
        To write four pages data into mifare ultralight card.
        Parameters:
        pageOffset - the page no to be wrote, 0~15.
        data - the page data to be wrote, 16 bytes.
